General.Name: First Foods Group Inc
General.Description: First Foods Group, Inc. focuses on developing specialty chocolate products in the United States. It also focuses on new health-related brands, concepts, and products; and participates in the merchant cash advances. The company was formerly known as Litera Group, Inc. and changed its name to First Foods Group, Inc. in February 2017. The company was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Las Vegas, Nevada.
General.Address: 3773 Howard Hughes Parkway, Las Vegas, NV, United States, 89169-6014
